channel.title: Compiler error with ::yell

item.title: Compiler error with ::yell
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

did then when i compile it say

client.java:12268: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]"+playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12268: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]"+playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12268: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]"+playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12268: unclosed string literal PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]"+playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12269: 'else' without 'if' else if(playerRights == 2){ ^ client.java:12270: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12270: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12270: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12270: unclosed string literal PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12271: 'else' without 'if' else if(playerRights == 3){ ^ client.java:12272: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Staff]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12272: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Staff]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12272: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Staff]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12272: unclosed string literal PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Staff]"+playerName+": "+co mmand.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12273: 'else' without 'if' else{ ^ 15 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compiler error with ::yell
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

try

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1){ sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");} else if(playerRights == 1){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]"+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 2){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]"+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 3){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Staff]"+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else{ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} }

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error with ::yell
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

when i put this on my yell command

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else if(playerRights == 1){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 2){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 3){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [staff]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }

then i compile it say this

client.java:12268: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12268: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12268: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12268: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12270: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12270: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12270: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12270: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12272: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [staff]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12272: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [staff]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12272: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [staff]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12272: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [staff]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ 12 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
